name: Claude Bio Research
description: An agent that uses Anthropic's bio research knowledge work plugin and powered by Claude Sonnet 4.5
long_description: An agent that uses Anthropic's bio research knowledge work plugin and powered by Claude Sonnet 4.5. Agents: claude-bio-research (ChatBot). Models: gpt-5.2, scvi`, scvi.
